record.title: Book of hours by the Master of Zweder van Culemborg - KB 79 K 2 - folios 012v (left) and 013r (right)
record.GWToolsettitle: Book of hours by the Master of Zweder van Culemborg - KB 79 K 2 - folios 012v (left) and 013r (right)
record.description:
Lefthand side folio 012v and righthand side folio 013r from the Book of hours by the [[w:en:Master_of_Zweder_van_Culemborg|Master(s) of Zweder van Culemborg]] =====Illuminations on the left folio 012v===== *The full-page miniature shows The Annunciation: Gabriel announces Christ's birth to Mary *God the father as bearded old man, usually with crown or tiara or sceptre and/or globe ([http://iconclass.org/rkd/11C23 11C23]) *Codex - ll - codex open ([http://iconclass.org/rkd/49LL72 49LL72]) *Reading ([http://iconclass.org/rkd/49N 49N]) *The annunciation: mary kneeling (+ god the father) ([http://iconclass.org/rkd/73A523(+11) 73A523(+11)])
=====Illuminations on the right folio 013r===== *The historiated initial shows Bethrothal of Mary *Roman script; scripts based on the roman alphabet (h) ([http://iconclass.org/rkd/49L12(H) 49L12(H)]) *Historiated initial ([http://iconclass.org/rkd/49L171 49L171]) *Marriage of mary and joseph, 'sposalizio': they are married by the high priest ([http://iconclass.org/rkd/73A42 73A42])

record.description:
Lefthand side folio 027v and righthand side folio 028r from the Book of hours by the [[w:en:Master_of_Zweder_van_Culemborg|Master(s) of Zweder van Culemborg]] =====Illuminations on the left folio 027v===== *The full-page miniature shows The Nativity: Mary seated, holding the Christ-child; St. Joseph; annunciation of Christ's birth to the shepherds (background) *Annunciation of christ's birth to the shepherds (and/or shepherdesses) at night; a host of singing angels in the air ([http://iconclass.org/rkd/73B14 73B14]) *Adoration of the christ-child by the shepherds; mary and joseph present ([http://iconclass.org/rkd/73B25 73B25]) *The ox and the ass at the manger ~ christ's birth (+ variant) ([http://iconclass.org/rkd/73B281(+0) 73B281(+0)])
=====Illuminations on the right folio 028r===== *The historiated initial shows The Nativity: the adoration of the Christ-child by Mary and St. Joseph *Roman script; scripts based on the roman alphabet (g) ([http://iconclass.org/rkd/49L12(G) 49L12(G)]) *Historiated initial ([http://iconclass.org/rkd/49L171 49L171]) *Adoration of the christ-child by mary and joseph ([http://iconclass.org/rkd/73B23 73B23])

record.description:
Lefthand side folio 033v and righthand side folio 034r from the Book of hours by the [[w:en:Master_of_Zweder_van_Culemborg|Master(s) of Zweder van Culemborg]] =====Illuminations on the left folio 033v===== *The full-page miniature shows The adoration of the Christ-child by the Magi *Adoration of the kings: the wise men present their gifts to the christ-child (gold, frankincense and myrrh) ([http://iconclass.org/rkd/73B57 73B57])
=====Illuminations on the right folio 034r===== *The historiated initial shows The presentation in the temple: Mary presents the Christ-child to Simeon *Roman script; scripts based on the roman alphabet (g) ([http://iconclass.org/rkd/49L12(G) 49L12(G)]) *Historiated initial ([http://iconclass.org/rkd/49L171 49L171]) *Presentation of the christ-child in the temple, usually simeon (and anna) present (luke 2:22-39) ([http://iconclass.org/rkd/73B4 73B4])

record.description:
Lefthand side folio 070v and righthand side folio 071r from the Book of hours by the [[w:en:Master_of_Zweder_van_Culemborg|Master(s) of Zweder van Culemborg]] =====Illuminations on the left folio 070v===== *The full-page miniature shows The arrest of Christ: the kiss of Judas; the ear of Malchus cut off by St. Peter *The kiss of judas: accompanied by soldiers with torches and lanterns, he kisses christ ([http://iconclass.org/rkd/73D313 73D313]) *Peter draws his sword and cuts off malchus' ear ([http://iconclass.org/rkd/73D3141 73D3141])
=====Illuminations on the right folio 071r===== *The historiated initial shows The tortures of Christ: Christ is mocked *Roman script; scripts based on the roman alphabet (h) ([http://iconclass.org/rkd/49L12(H) 49L12(H)]) *Historiated initial ([http://iconclass.org/rkd/49L171 49L171]) *Mockings of christ, who may be blindfolded ([http://iconclass.org/rkd/73D353 73D353])

record.description: Lefthand side folio 073v and righthand side folio 074r from the Book of hours by the [[w:en:Master_of_Zweder_van_Culemborg|Master(s) of Zweder van Culemborg]] =====Illuminations on the right folio 074r===== *The historiated initial shows Christ before Pilate *Roman script; scripts based on the roman alphabet (g) ([http://iconclass.org/rkd/49L12(G) 49L12(G)]) *Historiated initial ([http://iconclass.org/rkd/49L171 49L171]) *Christ before pontius pilate (matthew 27:11-26; mark 15:2-15; luke 23:2-7, 23:13-25; john 18:28 - 19:16) ([http://iconclass.org/rkd/73D323 73D323])

Lefthand side folio 076v and righthand side folio 077r from the Book of hours by the [[w:en:Master_of_Zweder_van_Culemborg|Master(s) of Zweder van Culemborg]] =====Illuminations on the left folio 076v===== *The full-page miniature shows The tortures of Christ: Christ is flagellated *Flagellation by soldiers, christ usually tied to a column (matthew 27:26; mark 15:15; john 19:1) ([http://iconclass.org/rkd/73D351 73D351])
=====Illuminations on the right folio 077r===== *The historiated initial shows The tortures of Christ: Christ is crowned with thorns *Roman script; scripts based on the roman alphabet (g) ([http://iconclass.org/rkd/49L12(G) 49L12(G)]) *Historiated initial ([http://iconclass.org/rkd/49L171 49L171]) *The crowning with thorns: soldiers with sticks place a thorny crown on christ's head and give him a reed (matthew 27:27-31; mark 15:16-20; john 19:2-3) ([http://iconclass.org/rkd/73D352 73D352])

record.description:
Lefthand side folio 079v and righthand side folio 080r from the Book of hours by the [[w:en:Master_of_Zweder_van_Culemborg|Master(s) of Zweder van Culemborg]] =====Illuminations on the left folio 079v===== *The full-page miniature shows The carrying of the cross: Christ bears the cross *The apostle john the evangelist; possible attributes: book, cauldron, chalice with snake, eagle, palm, scroll - non-miraculous activities and events ~ male saint ([http://iconclass.org/rkd/11H(JOHN)4 11H(JOHN)4]) *Carrying of the cross: christ bearing the cross, alone or with the help of others (e.g. simon the cyrenian) (+ mary) ([http://iconclass.org/rkd/73D41(+2) 73D41(+2)])
=====Illuminations on the right folio 080r===== *The historiated initial shows Christ in agony waiting to be crucified *The margin shows Angels holding instrument of the Passion: column, scourge and reed

record.description:
Lefthand side folio 082v and righthand side folio 083r from the Book of hours by the [[w:en:Master_of_Zweder_van_Culemborg|Master(s) of Zweder van Culemborg]] =====Illuminations on the left folio 082v===== *The full-page miniature shows The Crucifixion, with Mary, St. John, St. Mary Magdalene, the confessing centurion, and soldiers *The soldier; the soldier's life ([http://iconclass.org/rkd/45B 45B]) *The superscription: i(esus) n(azarenus) r(ex) i(udaeorum) ~ christ's crucifixion ([http://iconclass.org/rkd/73D58 73D58]) *Bystanders at the foot of the cross, among whom mary, mary magdalene and john the evangelist; mary may be shown swooning - dd - only christ on the cross ([http://iconclass.org/rkd/73DD625 73DD625]) *The centurion confessing his belief in christ; sometimes the soldiers do the same - dd - only christ on the cross ([http://iconclass.org/rkd/73DD631 73DD631])
=====Illuminations on the right folio 083r===== *The historiated initial shows Sacrifice of Isaac *The margin shows Angels holding Instruments of the Passion: sponge, jar with vinegar(?) *Roman script; scripts based on the roman alphabet (g) ([http://iconclass.org/rkd/49L12(G) 49L12(G)]) *Historiated initial ([http://iconclass.org/rkd/49L171 49L171]) *When abraham has his hand raised to kill isaac, an angel restrains abraham's hand ([http://iconclass.org/rkd/71C131311 71C131311])

record.description:
Lefthand side folio 085v and righthand side folio 086r from the Book of hours by the [[w:en:Master_of_Zweder_van_Culemborg|Master(s) of Zweder van Culemborg]] =====Illuminations on the left folio 085v===== *The full-page miniature shows The Deposition: Christ is taken down from the cross *Descent from the cross: christ is taken down from the cross, usually by nicodemus and joseph of arimathaea who are standing on the ladders (both arms of christ detached) ([http://iconclass.org/rkd/73D71 73D71])
=====Illuminations on the right folio 086r===== *The historiated initial shows Lamentation *The margin shows Angels holding Instruments of the Passion: hammer and pincers, three nails, lance *Roman script; scripts based on the roman alphabet (g) ([http://iconclass.org/rkd/49L12(G) 49L12(G)]) *Historiated initial ([http://iconclass.org/rkd/49L171 49L171]) *Christ's body supported by mary, others present ([http://iconclass.org/rkd/73D72121 73D72121])

record.description: Lefthand side folio 092v and righthand side folio 093r from the Book of hours by the [[w:en:Master_of_Zweder_van_Culemborg|Master(s) of Zweder van Culemborg]] =====Illuminations on the left folio 092v===== *The full-page miniature shows The Ascension: Christ ascends into heaven above Mary and the apostles, leaving his footprints on the Mount of Olives *Christ almost vanished: only feet visible ~ ascension ([http://iconclass.org/rkd/73E425 73E425]) *The footprints of christ on the mount of olives ~ the ascension ([http://iconclass.org/rkd/73E44 73E44])

record.description: Lefthand side folio 104v and righthand side folio 105r from the Book of hours by the [[w:en:Master_of_Zweder_van_Culemborg|Master(s) of Zweder van Culemborg]] =====Illuminations on the left folio 104v===== *The full-page miniature shows Madonna: Mary standing on the crescent, holding the Christ-child *Madonna on the crescent of the moon (sometimes called queen of heaven) (in mandorla) (+ angels floating in the air) ([http://iconclass.org/rkd/11F4132(+31) 11F4132(+31)]) *Angel(s) with other object(s), e.g. weapons ([http://iconclass.org/rkd/11G1926 11G1926]) *Angels crowning and/or bringing palm-branches (+ variant) ([http://iconclass.org/rkd/11G23(+0) 11G23(+0)])

record.description: Lefthand side folio 108v and righthand side folio 109r from the Book of hours by the [[w:en:Master_of_Zweder_van_Culemborg|Master(s) of Zweder van Culemborg]] =====Illuminations on the left folio 108v===== *The full-page miniature shows St. John the Baptist *Specific forms of the cross ([http://iconclass.org/rkd/11D123 11D123]) *Lamb bearing cross or banner, 'agnus dei' ~ symbol of christ ([http://iconclass.org/rkd/11D1311 11D1311]) *John the baptist; possible attributes: book, reed cross, baptismal cup, honeycomb, lamb, staff ([http://iconclass.org/rkd/11H(JOHN THE BAPTIST) 11H(JOHN THE BAPTIST)]) *Lantern ([http://iconclass.org/rkd/41B33 41B33]) *Lamb (+ animals used symbolically) ([http://iconclass.org/rkd/47I2133(+91) 47I2133(+91)]) *Banderole ([http://iconclass.org/rkd/49L73 49L73])

record.description: Lefthand side folio 111v and righthand side folio 112r from the Book of hours by the [[w:en:Master_of_Zweder_van_Culemborg|Master(s) of Zweder van Culemborg]] =====Illuminations on the left folio 111v===== *The full-page miniature shows All Saints *Lamb bearing cross or banner, 'agnus dei' ~ symbol of christ ([http://iconclass.org/rkd/11D1311 11D1311]) *Male saints (with name) - male saint represented in a group ([http://iconclass.org/rkd/11H(...)0 11H(...)0]) *Devotion: all saints picture, 'allerheiligenbild' ([http://iconclass.org/rkd/11H(ALL SAINTS)3 11H(ALL SAINTS)3]) *John the baptist; possible attributes: book, reed cross, baptismal cup, honeycomb, lamb, staff - male saint represented in a group ([http://iconclass.org/rkd/11H(JOHN THE BAPTIST)0 11H(JOHN THE BAPTIST)0]) *The apostle peter, first bishop of rome; possible attributes: book, cock, (upturned) cross, (triple) crozier, fish, key, scroll, ship, tiara - male saint represented in a group ([http://iconclass.org/rkd/11H(PETER)0 11H(PETER)0]) *The virgin martyr catherine of alexandria; possible attributes: book, crown, emperor maxentius, palm-branch, ring, sword, wheel - female saint represented in a group ([http://iconclass.org/rkd/11HH(CATHERINE)0 11HH(CATHERINE)0]) *Crown (symbol of sovereignty) ([http://iconclass.org/rkd/44B191 44B191]) *Lamb (+ animals used symbolically) ([http://iconclass.org/rkd/47I2133(+91) 47I2133(+91)]) *Banderole ([http://iconclass.org/rkd/49L73 49L73])

record.description: Lefthand side folio 112v and righthand side folio 113r from the Book of hours by the [[w:en:Master_of_Zweder_van_Culemborg|Master(s) of Zweder van Culemborg]] =====Illuminations on the left folio 112v===== *The full-page miniature shows St. John the Evangelist *The apostle john the evangelist; possible attributes: book, cauldron, chalice with snake, eagle, palm, scroll ([http://iconclass.org/rkd/11H(JOHN) 11H(JOHN)]) *Chalice ([http://iconclass.org/rkd/11Q71441 11Q71441]) *Fabulous animals ~ snakes (aspic, dragon, hydrus, hydra, amphisbaena, horned snake, cerastes) (+ animals as attributes) ([http://iconclass.org/rkd/25FF42(+13) 25FF42(+13)]) *Index finger and middle finger raised, closed (+ blessing) ([http://iconclass.org/rkd/31A25561(+915) 31A25561(+915)]) *Violent death by poisoned cup (+ variant) ([http://iconclass.org/rkd/31E233321(+0) 31E233321(+0)])

record.description: Lefthand side folio 116v and righthand side folio 117r from the Book of hours by the [[w:en:Master_of_Zweder_van_Culemborg|Master(s) of Zweder van Culemborg]] =====Illuminations on the left folio 116v===== *The full-page miniature shows St. George on horseback fighting the dragon, stabbing it with his lance; the princess nearby, praying *St. george and the dragon: dressed in armour and mounted on a (white) horse he brandishes his sword (his lance lies already broken on the ground); the princess nearby may be shown praying or fleeing ([http://iconclass.org/rkd/11H(GEORGE)41 11H(GEORGE)41])

record.description: Lefthand side folio 118v and righthand side folio 119r from the Book of hours by the [[w:en:Master_of_Zweder_van_Culemborg|Master(s) of Zweder van Culemborg]] =====Illuminations on the left folio 118v===== *The full-page miniature shows St. Christopher carries the Christ child, a hermit guiding him with a lamp *St. christopher, with the infant christ on his shoulders, wading through the water and carrying his staff (palm-tree); sometimes a hermit stands on the further bank beside a chapel, a lantern in his hand ([http://iconclass.org/rkd/11H(CHRISTOPHER)51 11H(CHRISTOPHER)51])

record.description: Lefthand side folio 120v and righthand side folio 121r from the Book of hours by the [[w:en:Master_of_Zweder_van_Culemborg|Master(s) of Zweder van Culemborg]] =====Illuminations on the left folio 120v===== *The full-page miniature shows St. Martin, Bishop of Tours, dividing his cloak *St. martin divides his cloak (i.e. the charity of st. martin): he is usually shown on horseback, cutting his cloak with his sword, or putting part of the cloak round the shoulders of a beggar who kneels beside him ([http://iconclass.org/rkd/11H(MARTIN)41 11H(MARTIN)41])

record.description: Lefthand side folio 122v and righthand side folio 123r from the Book of hours by the [[w:en:Master_of_Zweder_van_Culemborg|Master(s) of Zweder van Culemborg]] =====Illuminations on the left folio 122v===== *The full-page miniature shows St. Antony Abbot of Egypt sitting on flames and holding a book, with a pig and a lion *Specific forms of the cross: tau-cross ([http://iconclass.org/rkd/11D123(TAU-CROSS) 11D123(TAU-CROSS)]) *The hermit antony abbot (antonius abbas) of egypt, also called the great; possible attributes: bell, book, t-shaped staff, flames, pig ([http://iconclass.org/rkd/11H(ANTONY ABBOT) 11H(ANTONY ABBOT)]) *Abbey, monastery, convent ~ roman catholic church ([http://iconclass.org/rkd/11P3151 11P3151]) *Abbot ([http://iconclass.org/rkd/11P315311 11P315311]) *Beasts of prey, predatory animals: lion (+ animals as attributes) ([http://iconclass.org/rkd/25F23(LION)(+13) 25F23(LION)(+13)]) *Friendship between man and animal; caressing, petting ([http://iconclass.org/rkd/34A1 34A1]) *Flame ([http://iconclass.org/rkd/41B121 41B121]) *Walking-stick, staff, cane ([http://iconclass.org/rkd/41D263 41D263]) *Bell ~ acoustic signalling ([http://iconclass.org/rkd/46E521 46E521]) *Pig (+ animals as attributes) ([http://iconclass.org/rkd/47I212(+913) 47I212(+913)])

record.description: Lefthand side folio 124v and righthand side folio 125r from the Book of hours by the [[w:en:Master_of_Zweder_van_Culemborg|Master(s) of Zweder van Culemborg]] =====Illuminations on the left folio 124v===== *The full-page miniature shows St. Mary Magdalene holding a palm and a jar of ointment *The penitent harlot mary magdalene; possible attributes: book (or scroll), crown, crown of thorns, crucifix, jar of ointment, mirror, musical instrument, palm-branch, rosary, scourge ([http://iconclass.org/rkd/11HH(MARY MAGDALENE) 11HH(MARY MAGDALENE)]) *Trees: palm-tree (+ branch, stick) ([http://iconclass.org/rkd/25G3(PALM-TREE)(+22) 25G3(PALM-TREE)(+22)]) *Ointment-jar ([http://iconclass.org/rkd/31A51453 31A51453])

record.description: Lefthand side folio 130v and righthand side folio 131r from the Book of hours by the [[w:en:Master_of_Zweder_van_Culemborg|Master(s) of Zweder van Culemborg]] =====Illuminations on the left folio 130v===== *The full-page miniature shows St. Dorothea of Caesarea holding a palm and a basket with roses *The virgin martyr dorothea of caesarea; possible attributes: basket of roses and apples, child with basket of roses, garland of roses, roses in hand or lap ([http://iconclass.org/rkd/11HH(DOROTHEA) 11HH(DOROTHEA)]) *Trees: palm-tree (+ branch, stick) ([http://iconclass.org/rkd/25G3(PALM-TREE)(+22) 25G3(PALM-TREE)(+22)]) *Flowers: rose ([http://iconclass.org/rkd/25G41(ROSE) 25G41(ROSE)]) *Container made of plant material other than wood: basket ([http://iconclass.org/rkd/41A7751 41A7751])
